I talk of this problem!

![d4cd07ef24.jpg](http://puu.sh/hNybc/d4cd07ef24.jpg)

You can see the part is not contained within its "tile" in the VAB and extends to block the tile above.

Any way to fix this?

Many thanks.

**Edit:** Many apologies, this was supposed to go in the modelling sub-forum.

Perhaps a moderator can move it?

**Edit 2:** Thanks Anon mod!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-14T23:36:59Z" title="05/14/2015 11:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 14, 2015</time> by Beale**
I think I've had that when I've forgotten colliders..
Ah, skinned mesh always makes them tiny for me

Thanks for the replies guys, I missed these!

But, I found the solution:

The problem was, the model of the arm that unfolded needed to be loaded into Unity already in the correct orientation, rather than rotated once added to the scene. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
